content:
Do we have any documentation / tooling (experimental or in dev, etc.) to help build and link / run components in C ?

I'm trying to build and link a C++/C application using components, I know the current WASI-SDK has limited support for this. But assuming work is on gong at the moment on creating the component structures, is there a set of tooling - even experimental / unstable / pre-release tooling available ? -- I understand if this is still a work in progress, but thought I'd ask. Perhaps I've got my command line parameters wrong? - any tips would be most welcome.
